name: AVCaptureOutput
desc: The abstract superclass for objects that output the media recorded in a capture session.

items.name: func connection(with: AVMediaType) -> AVCaptureConnection?
items.desc: Returns the first connection in the connections array with an input port of a specified media type.

items.name: enum AVCaptureOutput.DataDroppedReason
items.desc: Information about why capture data was not delivered.

items.name: func transformedMetadataObject(for: AVMetadataObject, connection: AVCaptureConnection) -> AVMetadataObject?
items.desc: Converts the visual properties of an AVMetadataObject to the output’s coordinates.

items.name: func metadataOutputRectConverted(fromOutputRect: CGRect) -> CGRect
items.desc: Converts a rectangle in the capture output object’s coordinate system to one in the coordinate system used for metadata outputs.

items.name: func outputRectConverted(fromMetadataOutputRect: CGRect) -> CGRect
items.desc: Converts a rectangle in the coordinate system used for metadata outputs to one in the capture output object’s coordinate system.
